sentences.sContent: Nearby were two canoes in which they had cine to the island.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nearby were two canoes in which they had cine to the island.
sentences.sCn: 附近有二条独木舟，他们就是坐这个独木舟来的。

sentences.sContent: The rivers are our brothers; they quench our thirst. The rivers carry our canoes, and feed our children.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rivers are our brothers; they quench our thirst. The rivers carry our canoes, and feed our children.
sentences.sCn: 我们兄弟的河流解了我们的渴，河流载送我们的独木舟而且喂养了我们的孩子。

sentences.sContent: When we reached the downstream end of the island and were about to get back into our inflatable rafts Cho said, "Ed – look behind you". I turned and saw five canoes paddling up to us.
sentences.sContent_eng: When we reached the downstream end of the island and were about to get back into our inflatable rafts Cho said, "Ed – look behind you". I turned and saw five canoes paddling up to us.
sentences.sCn: 当我们走到小岛在下游处的顶端准备回到橡皮艇上时，裘对我说，“艾德，看后面，”我回过头来，看见有五条独木舟正向我们划来。

trans.tranOther: A canoe is a small, narrow boat that you move through the water using a stick with a wide end called a paddle
